Name: Mango Punch
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A distinctly tropical cocktail flavoured with mango.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly (Simon Difford).
Nutrition: One serving of Mango Punch contains 266 calories
